flawed_nl_solution:
On the math test he gets 30 questions correct because 40 x 0.75 = <<40*0.75=30>>30
On the English test he gets 94 questions right because 50 x 0.98 = <<50*0.98=94>>94
He gets 124 questions right in total.
#### 124

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 49, not 94. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
